instructions: Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 1 1 Open iTunes on your desktop. It's a white app with a multicolored musical note. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 2 2 Connect your iPhone to your desktop. Use the cable that came with your iPhone, plugging the USB end into the computer and the other end into your iPhone's charging port. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 3 3 Click on your iPhone's icon. It's in the gray bar at the top-left of the iTunes window. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 4 4 Click on . It's in the left pane of the iTunes window. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 5 5 Click on . It's in the upper part of the window's right pane. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 6 6 Click on a backup. Choose a backup with a date prior to the date your contacts were deleted from your iPhone. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 7 7 Click on . Once the process is complete, your iPhone contacts will be restored to the state they were in on the date of the backup you chose. Advertisement

Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 8 1 Open Settings Image titled Iphonesettingsappicon.png . It's a gray app that contains gears and is typically located on your home screen. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 9 2 Scroll down and tap Image titled Iphonesettingsgeneralicon.png General. It's at the top of the third section down from your Apple ID. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 10 3 Scroll down and tap . It's at the bottom of the menu. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 11 4 Tap . It's near the top of the menu. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 12 5 Enter your passcode. Enter the passcode you use to unlock your phone. If prompted, enter your "Restrictions" passcode. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 13 6 Tap . Doing so will reset all settings, as well as erase the media and data on your iPhone. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 14 7 Wait for the iPhone to reset. It may take a few minutes. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 15 8 Follow the on-screen prompts. The setup assistant will guide you through the process. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 16 9 Select a language. To do so, tap the language you prefer to use on your device. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 17 10 Select a country or region. Do so by tapping the country or region in which you'll use your device. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 18 11 Tap a Wi-Fi network. A list of available Wi-Fi networks appears near the top of the screen. If prompted, enter a network password. Alternatively, you can choose to connect to iTunes on your desktop with a USB cable by tapping Connect to iTunes . Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 19 12 Tap . It's in the upper-right corner of the screen. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 20 13 Choose a Location Services setting. Your device uses Location Services for Maps, Find My iPhone, and other apps that use your location. Tap Enable Location Services to allow apps on your device use your location. Tap Disable Location Services to deny the use of your location. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 21 14 Create a passcode. Type a passcode into the provided spaces. If you'd like to create a password different from the four- or six-digit default, tap Passcode Options at the bottom of the screen. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 22 15 Re-enter your passcode. Do so to confirm it. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 23 16 Tap . It's listed near the top of the setup options. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 24 17 Enter your Apple ID and password. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 25 18 Tap . It's in the upper-right corner of the screen. Doing so displays Apple's "Terms and Conditions." Scroll down to read them. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 26 19 Tap . It's in the lower-right corner of the screen. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 27 20 Tap a backup. Choose a backup with a date prior to the date you lost your contacts. Your iPhone will begin downloading the backup from iCloud. After it's restored, your settings, apps, and contact data will be reinstalled. Advertisement

Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 28 1 Open the Messages app. It's a green app that contains a white text bubble and is likely on your home screen. This option may work to recover the contact information for an individual you've previously texted. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 29 2 Tap the "New Message" icon. It's a square icon with a pencil in the upper-right corner of the screen. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 30 3 Start typing the name of the lost contact. Image titled Recover Lost Contacts on an iPhone Step 31 4 Tap the contact info. If you see the contact you're looking for in the suggestions that appear as you type, tap the name or number to view the information. Advertisement
